instructions: Image titled Turn Off the Camera Upload on Dropbox on iPhone or iPad Step 1 1 Open Dropbox on your iPhone or iPad. It s the blue open box icon typically found on the home screen. Image titled Turn Off the Camera Upload on Dropbox on iPhone or iPad Step 2 2 Tap the gear. It s at the top-left corner of Dropbox. Image titled Turn Off the Camera Upload on Dropbox on iPhone or iPad Step 3 3 Tap . Image titled Turn Off the Camera Upload on Dropbox on iPhone or iPad Step 4 4 Slide the Camera Uploads switch to Image titled Iphoneswitchofficon.png . As long as this switch is off (white/gray), your photos will not automatically back up to Dropbox s Camera Uploads folder. Advertisement
